  <link href="//fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Montserrat:400,700" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css">
  <link href="//fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Lato:400,700,400italic,700italic" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://s.pageclip.co/v1/pageclip.css" media="screen">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/@coreui/icons@2.0.0-beta.3/css/all.min.css"><script>
    const gravatarHash = "953d19833b6b06cb9f2adbefdcf626affa5f541296a9f6e41990c937181d84c9";
    const gravatarURL = `https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/${gravatarHash}?s=64&d=identicon`;

    function setCircularFavicon(imageUrl) {
      const img = new Image();
      img.crossOrigin = "anonymous";

      img.onload = function () {
        const size = 64;
        const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
        canvas.width = canvas.height = size;
        const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');

        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.arc(size / 2, size / 2, size / 2, 0, Math.PI * 2);
        ctx.closePath();
        ctx.clip();

        ctx.drawImage(img, 0, 0, size, size);

        let favicon = document.querySelector('link[rel="icon"]');
        if (!favicon) {
          favicon = document.createElement('link');
          favicon.rel = 'icon';
          document.head.appendChild(favicon);
        }
        favicon.href = canvas.toDataURL('image/png');
      };

      img.onerror = function () {
        console.error("Failed to load Gravatar image.");
      };

      img.src = imageUrl;
    }

    setCircularFavicon(gravatarURL);
  </script>
</head>

<div class="container projects-container" id="projects">
	<h3>Projects</h3>
	<!-- Filter Controls -->

	<div id="Projectfilters" class="filters">

			>

					Quantum Machine Learning
				</option>

			</select>
		</div>

	<!-- Masonry grid container -->
	<div class="row row-cols-1 row-cols-md-2 row-cols-lg-3 g-4">
		 
      <div class="project-item" data-project-area="Machine Learning">
    <div class="col">
        <div class="card project-card">
            <div class="card-header">
                <h2 class="text-center">Face De-Identification</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body project-card-header">
                <!-- Brief -->
                <div class="text-muted text-center">
                    <p><em> Scalable privacy preserving face de-identification </em></p>
                </div>
                <!-- GitHub Stats Card Image --><div class="repostats">
                    
                    <a href="https://github.com/vinayak19th/Aesthetic-Face-De-Identification" target="_blank">
                        <img class="projectgit GitData" 
                        height=100 width=313 
                        src="https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api/pin/?username=vinayak19th&repo=Aesthetic-Face-De-Identification&card_width=313&theme=nord">
                    </a>
                </div><!-- Description -->
                <div class="card-text project-card-text">
                    <p>A scalable approach to preserving the privacy of bystanders in social media posts<br /></p>
<ul>
  <li>Entirely ‘<em>edge</em>’ system tested on low end android phones-</li>
  <li>Client side nature makes it scalable as no server compute required for new nodes,</li>
  <li>Edge compute improves privacy as unfiltered data never leaves the device</li>
  <li>Aesthetics are preserved via custom filter implementation based on human tendecies</li>
</ul>

                </div>
            </div>  
            <div class="card-footer project-card-footer">
                    <mark>&nbspTensorflow&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspOpenCV&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspAndroid&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspImage Filter&nbsp</mark> 
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
 
     
      <div class="project-item" data-project-area="Quantum Machine Learning">
    <div class="col">
        <div class="card project-card">
            <div class="card-header">
                <h2 class="text-center">QML-Tutorials</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body project-card-header">
                <!-- Brief -->
                <div class="text-muted text-center">
                    <p><em> Set of tutorials to learn teach Quantum Machine Learning </em></p>
                </div>
                <!-- GitHub Stats Card Image --><div class="repostats">
                    
                    <a href="https://github.com/vinayak19th/QML-Tutorials" target="_blank">
                        <img class="projectgit GitData" 
                        height=100 width=313 
                        src="https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api/pin/?username=vinayak19th&repo=QML-Tutorials&card_width=313&theme=nord">
                    </a>
                </div><!-- Description -->
                <div class="card-text project-card-text">
                    <p>A set of tutorials in Pennylane to teach <mark> Quantum Machine Learning</mark> convering:</p>
<ul>
  <li>Toy dataset generation using random quantum circuits</li>
  <li>Basic Variational or Explicit Models</li>
  <li>Data ReUploading Models</li>
  <li>Quantum Kernel Classifiers or Implicit Models</li>
</ul>

                </div>
            </div>  
            <div class="card-footer project-card-footer">
                    <mark>&nbspPennylane&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspTensorflow&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspNumpy&nbsp</mark> 
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
 
     
      <div class="project-item" data-project-area="Machine Learning">
    <div class="col">
        <div class="card project-card">
            <div class="card-header">
                <h2 class="text-center">ARCNN-keras</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body project-card-header">
                <!-- Brief -->
                <div class="text-muted text-center">
                    <p><em> TF-keras implementation of ARCNN which removes JPEG compression artifacts </em></p>
                </div>
                <!-- GitHub Stats Card Image --><div class="repostats">
                    
                    <a href="https://github.com/vinayak19th/ARCNN-keras" target="_blank">
                        <img class="projectgit GitData" 
                        height=100 width=313 
                        src="https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api/pin/?username=vinayak19th&repo=ARCNN-keras&card_width=313&theme=nord">
                    </a>
                </div><!-- Description -->
                <div class="card-text project-card-text">
                    <p>A tf-keras implementation of ARCNN mentioned in :<br /></p>
<ul>
  <li>Implemented ARCNN in tf.keras for easy of use</li>
  <li>Created a novel “lite” version using dilated convolutions and reducing the number of parameters to half of that of Faster ARCNN (64k -&gt; 32k)</li>
</ul>

                </div>
            </div>  
            <div class="card-footer project-card-footer">
                    <mark>&nbspTensorflow&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspKeras&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspDocker&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbsptf.data&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspPIL&nbsp</mark> 
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
 
     
      <div class="project-item" data-project-area="Web Development">
    <div class="col">
        <div class="card project-card">
            <div class="card-header">
                <h2 class="text-center">vinayak19th.github.io</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body project-card-header">
                <!-- Brief -->
                <div class="text-muted text-center">
                    <p><em> The code repo for this website and instructions </em></p>
                </div>
                <!-- GitHub Stats Card Image --><div class="repostats">
                    
                    <a href="https://github.com/vinayak19th/vinayak19th.github.io" target="_blank">
                        <img class="projectgit GitData" 
                        height=100 width=313 
                        src="https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api/pin/?username=vinayak19th&repo=vinayak19th.github.io&card_width=313&theme=nord">
                    </a>
                </div><!-- Description -->
                <div class="card-text project-card-text">
                    <p>Website hosting my resume and profile. Notable Features include:</p>
<ul>
  <li>System persistent dark mode (Remembers your preference via cookies)</li>
  <li>Live Github based Statistcs
    <ul>
      <li>Profie Statistics on the about page</li>
      <li>Project statistics per repository in the project page</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
  <li>Reactive design for mobile friendly operation</li>
  <li>Tabbed Page for certifications for easy of reading and management</li>
  <li>Header section with live links such as :
    <ul>
      <li>Direct whatsapp message</li>
      <li>Medium Profile</li>
      <li>Stack Overflow</li>
      <li>etc</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
  <li>Modular self generating based on yml datasheets</li>
</ul>

                </div>
            </div>  
            <div class="card-footer project-card-footer">
                    <mark>&nbspJekyll&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspBootStrap&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspJQuery&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspSCSS&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspHTML5&nbsp</mark> 
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
 
     
      <div class="project-item" data-project-area="Machine Learning">
    <div class="col">
        <div class="card project-card">
            <div class="card-header">
                <h2 class="text-center">LOW-RESOURCE ASR</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body project-card-header">
                <!-- Brief -->
                <div class="text-muted text-center">
                    <p><em> A project based on the BABEL Dataset from the US government </em></p>
                </div>
                <!-- GitHub Stats Card Image --><div class="repostats">
                    
                    <a href="https://github.com/vinayak19th/ASR-LOW-RESOURCE" target="_blank">
                        <img class="projectgit GitData" 
                        height=100 width=313 
                        src="https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api/pin/?username=vinayak19th&repo=ASR-LOW-RESOURCE&card_width=313&theme=nord">
                    </a>
                </div><!-- Description -->
                <div class="card-text project-card-text">
                    <ul>
  <li>An End-to-End Framework for performing automatic speech recognition on low-resource languages such as 
Urdu and Pashto <br /></li>
  <li>Created the framework based on ESPnet.</li>
</ul>

                </div>
            </div>  
            <div class="card-footer project-card-footer">
                    <mark>&nbspKaldi&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspESPNet&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspBash&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspPyTorch&nbsp</mark> 
                </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
 
     
      <div class="project-item" data-project-area="Quantum Machine Learning">

            <div class="card-body project-card-header">

                    <p><em> Implementations of code for the University of Toronto QML course </em></p>

  <li>Implemented in IBM Qiskit</li>

      <div class="project-item" data-project-area="Quantum Machine Learning">
    <div class="col">
        <div class="card project-card">
            <div class="card-header">
                <h2 class="text-center">PennyLane-Keras3</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="card-body project-card-header">
                <!-- Brief -->
                <div class="text-muted text-center">
                    <p><em> Demo showing how to use Pennylane with Keras 3 with full multi-backend support (TensorFlow, JAX, PyTorch). </em></p>
                </div>
                <!-- GitHub Stats Card Image --><div class="repostats">
                    
                    <a href="https://github.com/vinayak19th/PennyLane-Keras3" target="_blank">
                        <img class="projectgit GitData" 
                        height=100 width=313 
                        src="https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api/pin/?username=vinayak19th&repo=PennyLane-Keras3&card_width=313&theme=nord">
                    </a>
                </div><!-- Description -->
                <div class="card-text project-card-text">
                    <ul>
  <li>Created a wrapped for integrating Pennylane Qnodes into Keras3 models.</li>
  <li>System selected Pennylane interface automatically based on the keras backend</li>
  <li>Addded optimizations for JAX with <code class="language-plaintext highlighter-rouge">jax.compile</code></li>
</ul>

                </div>
            </div>  
            <div class="card-footer project-card-footer">
                    <mark>&nbspPennyLane&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspKeras&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspTensorFlow&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspJAX&nbsp</mark> 
                
                    <mark>&nbspPyTorch&nbsp</mark> 
                </div>
